title: Magnus Walker & Hannah Elliott
description:
Magnus Walker, everyone's favorite Porsche enthusiast stops by The Smoking Tire studio on the tail end of his world tour to promote his new book, "Dirt Don't Slow you Down," available on Amazon. We talk Porsche (obviously) but also racing, car culture all over the world, and Pebble Beach. Plus, Magnus talks Ferrari vs. Lamborghini. 

We are also joined by Bloomberg Autos columnist Hannah Elliot, a New York based automotive journalist fresh from her coverage of the Pebble Beach Concours D'Elegance

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/TkoxKUriIzw

Read Hannah's Column Here: 
https://www.bloomberg.com/authors/AR_gYx13m9A/hannah-elliott

And follow her on Instagram here: 
https://www.instagram.com/hannahelliottxo

Magnus's Book, "Dirt Don't Slow You Down," Is available in US Booksellers and on Amazon as of 9/1/17
https://goo.gl/2knLXc
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
